Smart Sandwich Toaster: A sandwich toaster that uses artificial intelligence to learn your preferences and adjust the toasting time and temperature accordingly. It can also suggest new sandwich combinations based on your taste preferences.

Multi-level Sandwich Toaster: A sandwich toaster with multiple levels, allowing you to toast different types of sandwiches simultaneously. For example, you could toast a grilled cheese on one level while toasting a turkey and avocado on another.
Sandwich Toaster with Built-in Grill: A sandwich toaster with a built-in grill, allowing you to grill your sandwiches for added flavor and texture.
Sandwich Toaster with Adjustable Width: A sandwich toaster with an adjustable width, allowing you to accommodate larger or smaller sandwiches.
Sandwich Toaster with Transparent Walls: A sandwich toaster with transparent walls, allowing you to see how your sandwich is toasting and ensuring that it is evenly toasted.
